# References
To learn more about Quarto websites visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.

The project used tensorflow for the ANN modeling, <https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/regression>.

The projcet used the shiny posit package in python to code the modeling application <https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/>.

Used Quarto for writing the report <https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/pdf-basics.html> and <https://github.com/nmfs-opensci/quarto_titlepages/blob/main/README.md>.
